- District 4 Arleen B. Rojas

# District 4 Arleen Bocatija Rojas

**Council Member, District 4**  
**Arleen Bocatija Rojas**

Elected: November 2021  
Term Expires: November 2026   (310) 952-1700 [arojas@carsonca.gov](mailto:arojas@carsonca.gov)

Arleen Bocatija Rojas, born in 1966 in Agana, Guam USA, is an active 31 year veteran Police Officer for the City of Los Angeles and holds the title as the First Female Filipino-American Police Officer in the history of the department. On November 2, 2021, Arleen won the seat as the newly elected councilmember for the City of Carson District 4

[Read Rojas' full biography](https://carsonca.gov/government/elected_officials/arleenrojasbio.php).

District 4 Map  
![district 4 map](https://ci.carson.ca.us/content/files/images/districts/district4.jpg)

Achievements

![](https://ci.carson.ca.us/content/files/images/icons/icons-taskforce.png)

Created Public Safety Task Force

 

![](https://ci.carson.ca.us/content/files/images/icons/icons-firstact.png)

Re-activated the Safety First Act Now (S.F.A.N.)

 

![](https://ci.carson.ca.us/content/files/images/icons/icons-relationship.png)

Improved Relationships Between Carson's

 

![](https://ci.carson.ca.us/content/files/images/icons/icons-law.png)

31 Years of Law Enforcement Officer

![](https://ci.carson.ca.us/content/files/images/icons/icons-country.png)

Public Service With the Filipnino-American

![](https://ci.carson.ca.us/content/files/images/icons/icons-mental.png)

Advocating Mental And Physical Health
